attributes.action: Ban Chewing Gum, to stop the mess on the streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is about time Wrigleys and other manufacturers stopped making chewing gum. We have to pay in our council tax, to clear up the mess in the streets.
Be like Singapore, ban chewing gum and  have clean streets.
If Wrigley's e.t.c., wants to continue making this stuff, they should be responsible for the clean-up.
